text: El Chavo del Ocho is a very popular Mexican sitcom. It was created and written by Roberto Gómez Bolaños. It stars Roberto Gómez Bolaños, María Antonieta de las Nieves, Carlos Villagrán, Florinda Meza, Ramón Valdés, Rubén Aguirre, Édgar Vivar, Raúl Padilla, Horacio Gómez Bolaños, and Angelines Fernández. It ran from 1971 through 1980 for 8 seasons. ==References== Category:Mexican television series Category:Sitcoms Category:1971 television series debuts Category:1971 establishments Category:1970s establishments in Mexico Category:1980 television series endings Category:1980 disestablishments Category:20th-century disestablishments in Mexico Category:1980s disestablishments in North America
title: El Chavo del Ocho
